net.kuujo.vertigo.message

Interface JsonMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJsonMessage

    public interface JsonMessage
extends Serializable
    A Vertigo message.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • id

        String id()
        Returns the message ID.
        Returns:
        The message ID.

      • source

        String source()
        Returns the message source address. This is the event bus address of the component from which this message tree originated.
        Returns:
        The source address.

      • parent

        String parent()
        Returns the parent ID.
        Returns:
        The parent message ID.

      • root

        String root()
        Returns the root ID. This is the ID of the original message in the message tree.
        Returns:
        The root message ID.

      • auditor

        String auditor()
        Returns the auditor address. When a new message is emitted from a component it is assigned an auditor. Any children created from the message will inherit the same auditor address.
        Returns:
        The message's auditor address.

      • body

        org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject body()
        Returns the message body.
        Returns:
        The message body.

      • tag

        String tag()
        Returns the message tag.
        Returns:
        A message tag.

      • createChild

        JsonMessage createChild()
        Creates a new child of the message with the same message data.
        Returns:
        A new child message.

      • createChild

        JsonMessage createChild(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject body)
        Creates a new child of the message.
        Parameters:
        body - The child body.
        Returns:
        A new child message.

      • createChild

        JsonMessage createChild(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject body,
                      String tag)
        Creates a new child of the message.
        Parameters:
        body - The child body.
        tag - A tag to apply to the child. If no tag is specified then the parent tag will be inherited.
        Returns:
        A new child message.

      • copy

        JsonMessage copy()
        Creates a copy of the message.
        Returns:
        A copy of the message.
